mapper.select: select b.store_name, og.people, to_char(og.order_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') order_date, og.order_status, p.no, p.final_pay, om.count, m.menu_name from business b, order_group og, personal_order p, order_menu om, menu m where p.no = #{no} and b.store_no = og.store_no and og.order_no = p.order_no and p.p_order_no = om.p_order_no and om.menu_no = m.menu_no order by order_date desc
